connect_to_facilitator_app.message_text:
@(json(object(
    "access_code", input.text,
    "rapidpro_uuid", contact.uuid,
    "rapidpro_fields", object(
    "name", fields.first_user_name,
    "gender", fields.gender,
    "parenttext_parent_id", fields.research_id)
)))

wa_templates.name: daily_interaction
wa_templates.text:
I've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready to continue with your goal, {{1}}?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

wa_templates.name: first_module_intro
wa_templates.text:
Its time to get started on your goal, {{1}}. Are you ready?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes!
2. Remind me tomorrow

wa_templates.name: start_started_mod_or_later_one
wa_templates.text:
You're almost finished with this goal! {{1}} What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. {{2}}
2. Leave this goal unfinished and select a new goal

wa_templates.name: unfinished_onboarding
wa_templates.text:
ParentText has begun. Are you ready to complete your registration?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me Later

wa_templates.name: select_goal
wa_templates.text:
You have made great progress. Are you ready to select your next parenting goal?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me Later

wa_templates.name: no_response
wa_templates.text: These messages dont seem to be working. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.

wa_templates.name: post_goal_checkin
wa_templates.text: Today we are taking a break from your goal, {{1}}, and checking in on your progress. Press 1 on your keypad to proceed.

wa_templates.name: complete_start_module
wa_templates.text:
Youre off track! Do you want to complete a previous skill or start a new skill?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Complete
2. Start new

onboarding_question_language.message_text: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.

joining_trigger_confirmation.message_text:
Sorry, NKText is no longer available on WhatsApp. Please join us on Telegram at https://t.me/NKText_bot and type "@input.text" to start.

Harap maaf, NKText tidak lagi tersedia di WhatsApp. Sila sertai kami di Telegram melalui pautan https://t.me/NKText_bot dan taip "@input.text" untuk mula menyertai NKText.
